about_the_game:
Blobbers! A community of blobfish have been displaced from their homes by a storm. Collect your friends and bring them home! SAVE THEM!

FEATURES

  • collect all the little blobs and the treasure!
  • hours and hours of levels to beat!
  • go up against starfishes, sharks, ghosts, and more!
  • easy to start and stop, pick up again later!

STORY


In a world full of vast oceans and hidden islands, there was a notorious pirate named Captain Gary, albeit notoriously bad at being a pirate. He was known far and wide for his unique ability of finding treasure but then losing it alongside his crew of loyal companions, the blobfish.



Captain Gary had spent his life exploring the clear blue seas, hunting for treasures that whispered in legends. One fateful day, while sailing through a treacherous storm, his ship, The Black Pearl, was struck by lightning, causing chaos to erupt on deck. The ship split in two, and the crew was separated from their beloved captain.



When Captain Gary awoke, he found himself stranded on a remote island, far away from his crew and their precious cargo. His heart sank, realizing that he had lost the map to his hidden treasure—the culmination of his life's work. Determined to recover his wealth, he knew he had to find his trusted blobfish minions, who had a remarkable talent for finding lost objects.



Will you use his map and minions to not only recover his treasure but get his beloved companions back to him? Captain Gary needs to repair his old trusty Black Pearl after all. Now hurry! HURRY!

name: Blobbers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 | AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
